AS- has to be low, otherwise all outputs will be high

ULA A16-A20   .cr1r1r0R2R1R0
000 $000000 - 11111111111100
010 $000000 - 11111111111101 ROM0
100 $000000 - 11111111111110
000 $010000 - 11111111111100
010 $010000 - 11111111111101 ROM0
100 $010000 - 11111111111110
000 $020000 - 11111111110011
010 $020000 - 11111111110111 ROM1
100 $020000 - 11111111111011
000 $030000 - 11111111110011
010 $030000 - 11111111110111 ROM1
100 $030000 - 11111111111011
000 $040000 - 11111111001111
010 $040000 - 11111111011111 ROM2
100 $040000 - 11111111101111
000 $050000 - 11111111001111
010 $050000 - 11111111011111 ROM2
100 $050000 - 11111111101111
000 $060000 - 10111111111111 CRAM
000 $120000 - 11111100111111
010 $120000 - 11111101111111 RAM0
100 $120000 - 11111110111111
000 $130000 - 11110011111111
010 $130000 - 11110111111111 RAM1
100 $130000 - 11111011111111
000 $140000 - 11001111111111
010 $140000 - 11011111111111 RAM2
100 $140000 - 11101111111111
